track.name: Hard Time Killin' Floor Blues
comments: Perfect song.
Perfect blues song.
I finally mastered this song this last sunday. Monday I was in the hospital for my dad (stroke). It's tuesday and... of course... it comes on via random.
West,west away,the round sun is falling
Well Gezma, the first thing you need to do is play in double drop D. Both Es need to be de-tuned.
nothing before, nothing since. this sticks...
It doesn't get much better than this.  I have to tray and learn how to play this song.
i enjoying this when i'm in hardtime!..
I even like the static...sounds more "hard time"
Especially haunting and poignant if you realize how influential this was.
just what I need when the world is crashing down around me........ THE BLUES
No help… no money… no home… lonely… all of the things that can bring a man to his knees are softly moaned in Skips lament. Lord knows I’ve been there too bro.

Wow now just listen to that !!!! Awsome how much better is this than all the radio shit they got on the air ways these days.... This is real music.. the kind of music that rips at your soul and makes you feel.....Long live the blues baby !!!!
Haunting.
Robert Crumb must be fond of this one, beautiful indeed! "authentique" in french...
I love this old style of blues. these people lived the blues
this song is as good as they get. it has a provocation to it, not wholly common enough.
there's just something about this song that chills me. it's just heartbreaking.
I second all under statements!!!!

skippy, you sing with the fervor of my grandma. 
My grandma's got soul. God bless her.
